name: mtn-dew
description: The original, the one that started it all. MTN DEW® exhilarates and quenches with its one of a kind taste. Also available caffeine free.

name: diet-mtn-dew
description: All the great, exhilarating taste of MTN DEW® with less calories. Also available caffeine free.

name: ice-mtn-dew
description: A clear, refreshing, lemon lime DEW®.

name: kickstart-original
description: MTN DEW® KICKSTART™ is returning to its roots. This NEW line of MTN DEW® KICKSTART™ offers the bold taste of original DEW® flavor that you know and love.

name: kickstart-ultra
description: MTN DEW® KICKSTART™ is returning to its roots. This NEW line of MTN DEW® KICKSTART™ offers the bold taste of original DEW® flavor with no added sugar.

name: kickstart-orange-citrus
description: MTN DEW® KICKSTART™ in energizing Orange Citrus. The perfect mix of DEW®, real fruit juice and just the right amount of kick.

name: kickstart-black-cherry
description: The perfect mix of DEW® and fruit juice, plus electrolytes (for taste) and just the right amount of kick to get things going.

name: kickstart-midnight-grape
description: When the sun goes down, you want to turn up. Now MTN DEW® KICKSTART™ comes in refreshing midnight grape flavor. Its combination of DEW®, juice and caffeine means that when the day ends, you’re just getting started.

name: kickstart-fruit-punch
description: MTN DEW® KICKSTART™ in energizing Fruit Punch. The perfect mix of DEW®, real fruit juice and just the right amount of kick.

name: kickstart-mango-lime
description: New MTN DEW® KICKSTART™ Mango Lime flavor blends the great taste of DEW with refreshing fruit juice and caffeine to charge your day.

name: kickstart-pineapple-orange-mango
description: When it’s time to refuel, grab MTN DEW® KICKSTART™ Pineapple Orange Mango. We mixed the refreshing taste of MOUNTAIN DEW® with real fruit juice, coconut water and just the right amount of kick for a sweet, delicious rush when you need it most.

name: kickstart-blueberry-pom
description: Experience a mouth-watering blend of blueberry pomegranate flavor, antioxidants, vitamins C + E and the perfect amount of carbonation to pump you up for whatever’s coming next.

name: kickstart-raspberry-citrus
description: MTN DEW® KICKSTART™ Raspberry Citrus flavor blends the taste of DEW with fruit juice, coconut water and caffeine for a great tasting way to recharge.

name: kickstart-blood-orange
description: Experience a mouth-watering burst of blood orange flavor, antioxidants, vitamins C + E and the perfect amount of carbonation to pump you up for whatever’s coming next.

name: kickstart-watermelon
description: Refuel with refreshing MTN DEW® KICKSTART™ in watermelon flavor. Made with real fruit juice and DEW®, it’s a great-tasting kick just when you need it most.

name: mtn-black-label
description: Introducing MTN DEW® BLACK LABEL®, crafted with dark berry flavor, real sugar, and herbal bitters.

name: mtn-white-label
description: Introducing MTN DEW WHITE LABEL™. DEW® made with tropical flavors and infused with citrus bitters that are deliciously refreshing.

name: mtn-pitch-black
description: The bold flavor of DEW® with a twist of citrus and dark fruit flavor.

name: mtn-dew-live-wire
description: The exhilarating taste of DEW® sparked with orange flavor. Give your taste buds a jolt.

name: mtn-dew-voltage
description: The exhilarating taste of DEW® charged with ginseng and raspberry citrus flavor. Lightning in a bottle.

name: mtn-dew-white-out
description: The exhilarating taste of DEW® with a blast of smooth citrus flavor. Built by DEW fans, for DEW fans.

name: mtn-dew-code-out
description: The exhilarating taste of DEW® with a rush of cherry flavor. It’ll have you seeing red.

name: mtn-dew-diet-code-out
description: The great taste and cherry rush of MTN DEW® CODE RED® with less calories.

name: mtn-dew-glass-bottles
description: Introducing the new MTN DEW® long-neck glass bottle. Real sugar. Real cool.
